sentences.en: A unified scheme has been developed for virus concentration from tapwater, seawater, and sewage.
sentences.cn: 已经研究了一种可以从自来水 、 海水和污水中浓缩病毒的统一程序.

sentences.en: Germany unified officially in 1990 ; Will the two Koreas unify?
Hatred of the foreigners had unified the Egyptians.
sentences.cn: 对异族的仇恨团结了埃及人.

sentences.en: It was Menes who was thought to have unified Upper and Lower Egypt.
sentences.cn: 人们认为正是这位美尼斯国王统一了上埃及与下埃及.

sentences.en: Newton proposed that heavenly and terrestrial motion could be unified with the idea of gravity.
sentences.cn: 牛顿提出天体和地球的运动可以用万有引力来解释。

sentences.en: Spain was unified in the 16 th century.
sentences.cn: 西班牙是在16世纪统一的.

sentences.en: Test is a unified national unity or their own provincesand cities?
sentences.cn: 考题是全国统一还是各省市自己统一?

sentences.en: The emperor unified the country by the sword.
sentences.cn: 那位皇帝用武力统一了全国.

sentences.en: The First Emperor of Qin unified China in 221 B.C.
sentences.cn: 秦始皇于公元前221年统一中国.

sentences.en: The teacher unified the answer of her pupil with hers.
sentences.cn: 老师核对了学生的答案.

sentences.en: The third principle is unified leadership and decentralized management.
sentences.cn: 第三个原则是统一领导,分散经营.

sentences.en: The whole earth would be unified at last.
sentences.cn: 整个世界将最终联合起来.

sentences.en: These ability interaction, it is organic and unified whole.
sentences.cn: 这些能力相互作用, 是有机统一的整体.

sentences.en: We must be unified into a united front.
sentences.cn: 我们必须联合起来结成统一战线.

words.tran_cn: 统一；使一致（unify的过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: (unify 的过去式和过去分词)，统一的，统一标准的，一元化的
trans.tran_en: created from more than one part, group etc

trans.tran_cn: 使联合( unify的过去式和过去分词 )，使相同，使一致，统一
